item.title: About
item.description: My name is Sunil Vijendra. I am passionate about building solutions and tools that simplify user experience and add value. At work, I design and build solutions for private and hybrid cloud systems. The views and opinions expressed here are solely mine and I do not speak for my employer.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Hello, World! I am a developer! So, the first blog on this page is also titled aptly :-) This post is to just check if all the gear is ready and working! All seem to be up and running. It is powered by Hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages. Mark the page and come back soon as I start sharing my learning!
